amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 116-395 to strike wilderness additions in the 3rd Congressional District.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to remove the designation of certain lands in Montezuma County, Colorado, as wilderness areas under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 234 (Roll no. 67).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 234 (Roll no. 67).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Tipton.
